Message.Title: Retirees Screwed
Message.Msg: Negotiations between Senate leaders and John boehner have yeilded very little. One thing they seem to agree on is the cost of benefits for retired federal and state employees. Many state retirees benefits, but not pensions, are funded through disbursements from the feds. Thus school retirees may be asked to pay all or part of their health care premiums and shoulder more of the cost by way of higher deductibles.

Message.Title: I am throwing a hissy fit tantrum
Message.Msg: I am screaming and punching and kicking everything. I am scratching my arms! I am yelling out my window to nobody! I smashed a picture of my mother. How can you call yourselves Christians?
